site_name: Wishing Star Farm L L C

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:56 am on
05-Jul-17.
Inspector knocked on front door contacted licensee by phone. Licensee told inspector they would not be able to
accompany on an inspection due to being out of state.
